message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $100. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer it to you for $98. This is my final offer, as I'm getting close to considering other options.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $92?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $96. This is my last offer, as I'm getting close to considering other options.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $94?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $98, Bob. I've already compromised quite a bit, and I'm not willing to lose money on this deal. I'm willing to meet you at $95, but no lower.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $95, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $93?
